main: ^Slow down and offer to help it.
FirstChoice: ^Yeah, that's an ostrich on the road.
SecondChoice: ^The ostrich curiously approaches the vehicle and starts pecking at the tires. (-1 tires, PARTY happiness -1)
ThirdChoice: ^The party offers the animal some food. The ostrich gladly takes it out of your offering hands. (-2 food, PARTY happiness +1)
